about.title: About TripCalc
about.mission: TripCalc was created to answer a simple question most travel websites can't: How much does a trip really cost?

difference.title: Why TripCalc?
difference.description: Most travel sites focus on inspiration, hotels, and attractions. TripCalc focuses on something more practical: real-world numbers, real traveler decisions, and real costs — based on experience, not generic averages.

realExperience.title: Built from Real Experience
realExperience.description: TripCalc is not a generic travel blog. It's built using:

points.1: First-hand travel experience across 6 cities with detailed cost data
points.2: Local knowledge from residents and verified sources
points.3: Real-world testing of transport, ATMs, SIMs, and daily expenses
points.4: Weather data powered by 80+ years of historical records
points.5: Data collected, verified, and refined over time

whatYouCanDo.title: What You Can Do with TripCalc

points.1: Estimate the real daily cost of a trip with budget, mid-range, and luxury breakdowns
points.2: Compare transportation options with real prices (metro, taxi, Uber, airport transfers)
points.3: Check weather forecasts with extreme condition alerts for your travel dates
points.4: Create day-by-day itineraries with timeline, interactive maps, and route calculations
points.5: Generate AI-powered packing lists optimized for your weight limit and climate
points.6: Track actual expenses vs. budget during your trip
points.7: Share trip plans and export as PDF or calendar
points.8: Understand tips, fees, and hidden costs that most sites won't tell you

premium.title: Premium Features
premium.description: TripCalc offers powerful free tools for every traveler. Premium users unlock advanced planning features:

points.1: Day-by-Day Itinerary Planner with timeline view, interactive maps, and route calculations
points.2: Smart Luggage Calculator with AI-powered packing suggestions and airline presets
points.3: All premium features included with a single subscription

community.title: Growing with the Community
community.description: TripCalc is actively growing with new features and data:

points.1: 6 cities with full cost data — Barcelona, Tokyo, New York, London, Paris, Mexico City
points.2: 3 calculators — Daily Cost, Transport Comparison, and Luggage Planner
points.3: Weather integration, expense tracking, trip sharing, and PDF export
points.4: More cities and features added regularly, always prioritizing accuracy over hype

about.finalMessage: TripCalc helps you plan with confidence by turning travel into numbers you can actually use.

footer.tagline: Because travelers deserve tools, not just inspiration.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.intro: Welcome to TripCalc. By using our service, you agree to these terms.

section1.title: 1. Data Privacy
section1.p1: We will never sell or share your personal data with third parties for marketing purposes.
section1.p2: Your email is only used for authentication and essential service communications.
section1.p3: We respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal information.

section2.title: 2. Use of Your Data
section2.p1: Trip data (budgets, expenses, itineraries, packing lists, custom items) is used to:

list.item1: Provide calculator functionality, trip planning, and weather forecast features
list.item2: Generate anonymous statistics to help future travelers
list.item3: Improve price accuracy through data normalization

section2.p2: All aggregated data is anonymized and cannot be traced back to individual users.
section2.p3: We collect analytics data (pageviews, events, session duration, anonymized geolocation) to improve the service. IP addresses are hashed before storage.

section3.title: 3. Price & Weather Data Disclaimer
section3.p1: While we strive for accuracy, travel costs displayed on TripCalc:

list.item1: May contain errors or be outdated
list.item2: Vary by season, demand, and exchange rates
list.item3: Are based on personal experience and user-submitted data
list.item4: Should be verified before making travel decisions

section3.p2: Prices are estimates and guidelines, not guarantees.
section3.p3: Weather forecasts are provided by Open-Meteo (a third-party service) and are limited to 16-day forecasts. Weather data is for informational purposes only and should not replace official weather warnings.

section4.title: 4. Premium Features & Subscriptions
section4.p1: TripCalc offers premium features (Itinerary Planner, Smart Luggage Calculator) through a paid subscription.

list.item1: Are billed monthly at the displayed price
list.item2: Can be cancelled at any time — access continues until the end of the billing period
list.item3: May include a free trial period for new subscribers
list.item4: Grant access to all current and future premium features during the subscription period

section4.p3: We reserve the right to change pricing with 30 days' notice to existing subscribers.

section5.title: 5. Limitation of Liability
section5.p1: TripCalc provides travel cost information as a guide only.

list.item1: Decisions made based on our data or weather forecasts
list.item2: Financial losses due to inaccurate information
list.item3: Changes in prices, weather, or travel conditions
list.item4: Issues arising from trip planning based on our tools

section5.p3: You are solely responsible for verifying all information and making your own travel decisions.

section6.title: 6. User-Generated Content
section6.p1: By submitting custom items, expenses, or feedback, you grant TripCalc the right to:

list.item1: Use the data to improve the service
list.item3: Share aggregated insights with the community

section6.p2: You retain ownership of your data and can delete it at any time.

list.item1: Scrape or automatically extract data from the site
list.item3: Abuse the service or interfere with other users
list.item4: Use the service for any illegal purpose

section8.title: 8. Intellectual Property
section8.p1: All content, design, code, and data on TripCalc is owned by TripCalc or its licensors.
section8.p2: Some content may be generated or assisted by AI tools. Such content remains the property of TripCalc.
section8.p3: You may not copy, modify, or distribute our content without permission.

section9.title: 9. Account Termination
section9.p1: You may delete your account at any time, which will remove all your personal data.
section9.p2: We reserve the right to suspend or terminate accounts that violate these terms.

section10.title: 10. Changes to Terms
section10.p1: We may update these terms from time to time.
section10.p2: Continued use of the service after changes constitutes acceptance of the new terms.
section10.p3: We will notify users of significant changes via email or site notification.

section11.title: 11. Contact & Support
section11.p1: For questions, errors, or feedback, contact us at:
section11.p2: We welcome your suggestions and will do our best to respond promptly.

section12.title: 12. Governing Law
section12.p1: These terms are governed by the laws of Republic of Chile.
section12.p2: Any disputes will be resolved in the courts of Republic of Chile.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: This Privacy Policy explains how TripCalc collects, uses, and protects your information.

section1.title: 1. Information We Collect
section1.p1: We collect information you provide directly:

list.item2: Trip data (budgets, expenses, custom items, itineraries, packing lists)
list.item3: Usage data (pages visited, features used, time on page)

list2.item1: IP-based geolocation (country, city, region) — IP addresses are hashed and never stored in plain text
list2.item3: Device and browser information for analytics

list.item2: Authenticate your account and manage sessions
list.item4: Display weather forecasts for your trip destinations
list.item5: Respond to your questions and support requests

section3.title: 3. Data Sharing & Third-Party Services
section3.p1: We do not sell your personal data.
section3.p2: We use the following third-party services:

list.item1: Open-Meteo — for weather forecast data (no personal data is shared, only city coordinates)
list.item2: Supabase — for database hosting and authentication

section3.p3: We may share anonymized, aggregated data with the community to help travelers.

section4.title: 4. Data Security
section4.p1: We use industry-standard security measures to protect your data.
section4.p3: Passwords are hashed and never stored in plain text.
section4.p4: IP addresses used for geolocation are hashed before storage (GDPR compliant).

section5.title: 5. Your Rights (GDPR)
section5.p1: If you are in the EU, you have the right to:

list.item3: Delete your data ('right to be forgotten')
list.item4: Export your data in a portable format
list.item5: Opt out of data processing for analytics

section6.title: 6. Cookies, Sessions & Analytics
section6.p1: We use essential cookies for authentication and session management (30-day sessions).
section6.p2: We use our own analytics system to track pageviews, events, and time on page. No third-party analytics trackers are used.
section6.p3: Analytics data includes: pages visited, features used, session duration, and anonymized geolocation (country/city level).
section6.p4: You can disable cookies in your browser settings, though this may affect authentication.

section7.title: 7. Data Retention
section7.p1: We retain your data as long as your account is active.
section7.p2: When you delete your account, your personal data is permanently removed.
section7.p3: Anonymized analytics and statistics may be retained indefinitely.

section8.title: 8. Premium Features & Subscriptions
section8.p1: If you subscribe to premium features, we store your subscription status and access dates.
section8.p2: Payment processing is handled by third-party providers. We do not store credit card information.

section9.title: 9. Children's Privacy
section9.p1: TripCalc is not intended for users under 13 years of age.
section9.p2: We do not knowingly collect data from children.

section10.title: 10. Changes to Privacy Policy
section10.p1: We may update this policy from time to time.
section10.p2: We will notify you of significant changes.

section11.title: 11. Contact
section11.p1: For privacy-related questions, contact us at:
